data.eml:eml: Draposa, a new wolf spider genus from South and Southeast Asia (Araneae: Lycosidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kronestedt, Torbjörn (2010): Draposa, a new wolf spider genus from South and Southeast Asia (Araneae: Lycosidae). Zootaxa 2637: 31-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198469
